scripts.assets: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache- && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache- && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache clean --force && npm install && rm -rf /tmp/haste-map-react-native-packager-* && rm -rf ios/Pods && cd ios && pod install
scripts.bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
